steps.content: The icon marked with ‘i’ will display the information regarding the dataflow, reporting obligation and legal instrument (extracted from ROD)
The pencil icon enables to edit the name, description or associated obligation of the dataflow as well as to delete it (explained in 3.1.2)
‘Export schema’ displays a dialog to confirm the dataflow schema download
The cog button displays the API key and other parameters for accessing Reportnet3 programmatically
This button displays a dialogue to manage (add) other users to collaborate in the dataflow design
This button displays a dialogue to manage (add) reporters to the dataflow (explained in 3.1.6)
For accessing to the dataflow help page (explained in 3.2)
By clicking on ‘New schema’, you can create a new dataset schema or clone and existing one (explained in 3.3)
The ‘Create data collections’ button published the dataflow out to the reporters. It is enabled when there is a schema, and a reporter has been added (explained in 3.1.7)
